nodes.text: Baral was the Keeper of memories of the Promised Ones following the death of Rukil. She recorded several holograms about the fate of the Outcasts following their exodus to the Promised Land, which were discovered by a Republic-allied individual on Taris. She was eventually succeeded by Ku-ki.

Baral was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. She appears in a hologram found by the Republic characters as part of the "Chasing History" mission.
